entry.title: 截断字符串或二进制数据
entry.content: 主要原因就是你增加的数据字段长度超过数据库中字段所定义长度，去查看一下自己数据库中的字段的长度， 一般是误写出来的，查看一下自己数据库中需要自己设置字段类型长度的字段，修改其字段长度为最大就可以了， Sql server 可以设置其为varchar(max)或者text类型，建议采用varchar(max),便于映射。

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

entry.title: Next主题的介绍
entry.content: 努力不简单«NexT» 是一款风格优雅的高质量 Hexo 主题，自点点滴滴中用爱雕琢而成。 var ap = new APlayer({ element: document.getElementById("aplayer-VGJCmWWV"), narrow: false, autoplay: true, showlrc: false, music: { title: "修炼爱情", author: "林俊杰", url: "http://plgx8fxsj.bkt.clouddn.com/lingjujiexlaq.mp3", pic: "http://plgx8fxsj.bkt.clouddn.com/ljj.jpg", lrc: "" } }); window.aplayers || (window.aplayers = []); window.aplayers.push(ap);

entry.title: Hexo的介绍
entry.content: 人的一切痛苦，本质上都是对自己的无能的愤怒 Hexo 是一个快速、简洁且高效的博客框架。Hexo 使用 Markdown（或其他渲染引擎）解析文章，在几秒内，即可利用靓丽的主题生成静态网页。 var ap = new APlayer({ element: document.getElementById("aplayer-tpKgwDqn"), narrow: false, autoplay: true, showlrc: false, music: { title: "修炼爱情", author: "林俊杰", url: "http://plgx8fxsj.bkt.clouddn.com/lingjujiexlaq.mp3", pic: "http://plgx8fxsj.bkt.clouddn.com/ljj.jpg", lrc: "" } }); window.aplayers || (window.aplayers = []); window.aplayers.push(ap);
